reviewText: I bought this for my mom and she loved it! I had been looking for this movie for such a long time that I was ecstatic to find it here. This is one of those movies from Mexico's Cine de Oro that is just a great present if you have family members or if you yourself grew up with these.
I will recommend it if people like good old black and white Mexican movies. With good sense of humor and like the actors.
